string-array.name: tfques
string-array.item: Franklin Roosevelt is one of the presidents depicted on Mount Rushmore.
Lightning never strikes the same place twice.
Bangalore is the "Silicon Valley of India."
Warts can be caused by touching certain animals, especially toads.
As a human body grows larger, its number of bones gets smaller.
The Red Sea gets its name from a slaughter that occurred there during biblical times.
The "dark side of the Moon" is the same as the "far side of the Moon."
Labrador retrievers were originally bred to retrieve fishing nets.
